title: The Woman's Study Bible: New King James Version
description: This is a new edition of the popular study Bible from today's well-known women authors for enriching a woman's heart, mind, and spirit with God's Word. The Woman's Study Bible is a priceless treasure, poignantly delivering the Word of God to a woman's heart. Dig deeper into God's Word with the help of inspiring articles from today's leading communicators. Its many features provide abundant resources to truly study the Bible. > Features
author: Anonymous
